get.summary: Get permalinks of category or forum
get.description: This API fetches all permalinks of a community category or forum.

post.summary: Update permalink of category or forum
post.description: This API updates the primary permalink of a community category or forum.
This API disables a community category or forum and restricts posting access to users.
This API enables a community category or forum and provides posting access to users.

get.description: This API lists all community categories to be displayed on the setup page of desk
This API lists a particular number of community categories.

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: ID of the department for which the categories to be filtered.

schema.description: ID of the department for which the categories to be filtered.

post.summary: Follow a community category or forum
post.description: This API helps users to follow a community category or forum.

post.summary: Unfollow a community category or forum
post.description: This API helps end-users unfollow a community category or forum.

get.summary: List followers of community category or forum
get.description: This API lists a particular number of users who follow a community category or forum, based on the limit defined.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Index number, starting from which the users must be listed

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the users must be listed

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: to filter agent and end user

schema.description: to filter agent and end user

get.summary: Get category or forum by permalink
get.description: This API fetches the details of a community category or forum, based on the permalink in the API request.
This API get a community categories details.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Name of the community category or forum
Name of the community category or forum
Visibility setting of the community category or forum. Values allowed are: @ALL@, @LOGGED_IN_USERS@, @GROUPS@ , @AGENTS@ and @MODERATORS@.
A brief description of the community category or forum
Key that defines whether topics posted in the forum must be automatically converted into tickets or not

Moderation setting for the community category or forum. Values allowed are: @NONE@ (no moderation), @ALL_POSTS@ (all posts of category will be moderated) and @FIRST_POST@ (only the first forum post of users will be moderated).
Name of the community category or forum

permissionObject.description: Permission object defining visibility rules. When permission=GROUPS, groupIds must contain at least one item; otherwise, groupIds must be null.

permission.description: Defines the visibility level for the content.

groupIds.description: When permission=GROUPS, list of HelpcenterGroups.id (must have at least one entry). For other permission types, should be null.

permalink.name: permalink
permalink.description: Permalink of the category or forum to fetch

include.name: include
include.description: Additional information related to the category or forum. Values allowed are: @postCount@, @followersCount@, and @commentCount@.

useOldPermalinkForRedirection.description: Key that defines whether the primary permalink of the category/forum must be used for redirection or not. Setting @TRUE@ adds the primary permalink to the 301 list and setting @FALSE@ overwrites the primary permalink.

permalink.description: Permalink of the category or forum
